scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others  "node bin/server.js" "node src/node_setup.js" "cd bin/ && python3 -m http.server && cd .."
scripts.build: rm -rf dist/; nexe -i 'src/node_setup.js' -r src/* -t x64-14.15.3; nexe -i 'bin/server.js' -r bin/server.js -t x64-14.15.3; mkdir dist/; cp interface.txt dist/; mv node_setup dist/; mv server dist/; cp bin/index.html dist/
scripts.zip: cp redbean/redbean-3.0.0.com dist/ && cd ./dist && zip redbean-3.0.0.com index.html interface.txt node_setup server
